review_title: Does not stand behind morals and ethics
job_title: Certified Medical Assistant in Salem, OR
pros: Kaiser health insurance has great benefits

The work you do is of great help to people who need help.
Good benefits.  Decent pay.
cons:
Corporate atmosphere includes fear, probably through all levels of the organization..
Politics is present above lower staff levels, and can have negative effects on staff and their work. 
Despite numerous written policies, actual work expectations are often unclear and often change.
Staff questions or comments are encouraged in theory, discouraged in practice.   Staff has little input.

review_title: Not the worst job but there's definitely better out there.
pros: Regular schedule,  moderate pay,  and some training offered.  Benefits are moderately good.   Insurance costs about 500 a month,  but they match 6% of retirement.
cons: Management is poor. Middle management had very frequent turn over and upper management didn't even understand the basics of HIPPA. Wages are stagnant and uneven.

pros: The people, customers and employees are so caring and compassionate !
cons: There are no cons with this employer.
